name: Cardinal Pixel
description:
If you love 8-bit art and traditional collectible card games, don’t miss this game! Cardinal Pixel is a vividly animated battle card game, it will bring you the 90’s excitment of playing boardgames and card games as well as the suprise from opening a card pack in the real world. Unlock and collect the pixel heroes from quests, grow your heroes and build your own team to defeat the rivals!

- Simple game play
Easy to pick up with simple control, beat your rivals with STRATEGY & LUCK.

- All you can play
Without any energy system, you can enjoy this game AT ANY TIME!

- Quest & treasure
Gain native coins and gems from quests and treasure boxes during your adventure in this game!

- Duel with players
Pick your heroes to build a dream team for BEATING THE OTHERS!

- Heroes
Progressing through quests to unlock and grow the 40+ HEROES WITH UNIQUE SKILLS and design!

- Magic
Don’t worry if you have not yet collected the “epic heroes”, you can use the magics wisely to TURN THE TABLES!


New heroes, magics, events and weekly ranking are coming soon!
Follow us to keep up with future updates!
